PSXApplication.name: sys_psxRelationshipSupport
PSXApplication.description: This applications provides query and update resources to maintain relationships in the PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP / PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIPPROP and RXRELATEDCONTENT tables.

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset934ids
PSXDataSet.description: Gets the current workflow status information for the supplied content ids.

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset159
PSXDataSet.description: Returns the content type information for the supplied contentid. The result document will return maximal 1 row of the CONTENTTYPE table.

PSXDataSet.name: translations
PSXDataSet.description: Get a list of all locales that have been translated already for the supplied contentid.

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT CONTENTSTATUSCHILD.CONTENTID AS CHILDCONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUSCHILD.LOCALE AS CHILDLOCALE, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.LOCALE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP, CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUSCHILD WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID=PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.OWNERID AND PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.DEPENDENTID = CONTENTSTATUSCHILD.CONTENTID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID IN (:"PSXSingleParam/contentids") AND PSX_OBJECTRELATIONSHIP.CONFIG='Translation' ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID ASC

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset67
PSXDataSet.description: Returns all current translations for the supplied contentid and/or language. The returned document conforms to the PSXRelatioship.dtd.

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEQUERYREQUEST FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, CONTENTTYPES CONTENTTYPES WHERE CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID IN (:"PSXSingleParam/contentids") ORDER BY CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID ASC

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset55
PSXDataSet.description: Gets the workflow status, the stae name and the information whether or not this is a public state.

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset137
PSXDataSet.description: Gets a list of transitions for the supplied workflow and state id. The list is ordered by transition name.

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset497
PSXDataSet.description: Get the transition information for the supplied content id, workflow id and workflow action trigger.

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset934
PSXDataSet.description: Gets the current workflow status information for the supplied content id.
